reasoning: Reporting incidence at ~0.35 per 100k person-years. Osteosarcoma of bone is a specific anatomical subtype with incidence of 3-4 per million globally based on SEER and international cancer registry data.
source: Mirabello L et al. (2009). Osteosarcoma incidence and survival rates from 1973 to 2004. Cancer. 115(7):1531-43
